record_hint: Hold to record, release to send after ${durationInSeconds} second
giphy_use_hint: Enable the Giphy feature to support sending GIF images and enjoy more fun in chatting. However, since we use Giphy's API interface, requesting the Giphy API will expose your IP address to the Giphy service. Do you agree to enable it?
press_duration_too_short: Press duration too short to send
no_recording_permission: No recording permission, please apply in settings
